column1: Hey, how are you? Let's catch up soon!
Congratulations! You've won a $1000 gift card. Click here to claim now.
Dear customer, your account balance is low. Please top up.
Reminder: Your appointment is scheduled for tomorrow at 3 PM.
You've been selected to receive a free vacation. Call now to claim!
Important: Your bank account has been accessed from an unknown device.
Hi, just checking in to see if you're free for lunch next week.
Limited time offer! Get 50% off on all products. Shop now!
Meeting rescheduled to next Monday at 10 AM. Please confirm.
Congratulations, you've been approved for a low-interest loan. Apply today!
